description: This file defines the main homepage component of a web application, providing a landing page with sections for hero information, quick action links, and a chat playground with reference selection. It includes React component definitions, state management, and UI layout code.

methods.name: Home
methods.description: Main React functional component for the homepage, rendering UI sections including hero info, quick action cards, and a chat playground with reference selection.

methods.name: ActionCard
methods.description: Reusable React component rendering an action card with a link, title, description, and button, used in the quick actions grid.
